Class RootPackages

extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of root packages.

      • addRootPackage

        public void addRootPackage(java.lang.String rootPackage)
        Adds root package with no additional mapping.

      • addRootPackageOf

        public void addRootPackageOf(java.lang.Class actionClass)

      • addRootPackage

        public void addRootPackage(java.lang.String rootPackage,
                           java.lang.String mapping)
        Adds root package and its path mapping. Duplicate root packages are ignored, if mapping path is equals, otherwise exception is thrown.

      • addRootPackageOf

        public void addRootPackageOf(java.lang.Class actionClass,
                             java.lang.String mapping)
        Sets root package to package of given class.

      • findRootPackageForActionPath

        public java.lang.String findRootPackageForActionPath(java.lang.String actionPath)
        Finds closest root package for the given action path.

      • findPackagePathForActionPackage

        public java.lang.String findPackagePathForActionPackage(java.lang.String actionPackage)
        Finds mapping for given action class. Returns null if no mapping is found. If there is more then one matching root package, the closest one will be returned.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
